SALT.name: NATURES BLACK SALT 250GMS
SALT.description_html:
NATURES BLACK SALT 250GMS

NATURES BLACK SALT 250GMS is a premium-quality, aromatic salt that adds a unique flavor to a variety of dishes. Also known as "Kala Namak" in Hindi, black salt is a staple in Indian cuisine and is widely used in chaats, salads, raitas, and curries. It is made by heating rock salt with herbs and spices, giving it its distinctive dark color and a complex, slightly tangy, and smoky taste.

Black salt is prized not only for its unique flavor but also for its potential health benefits. Rich in minerals such as iron, potassium, and magnesium, NATURES BLACK SALT is often used in Ayurvedic medicine for its digestive and detoxifying properties. It is believed to help improve digestion, reduce bloating, and provide relief from heartburn. As a seasoning, it adds depth to savory dishes and can be sprinkled over fruits, snacks, and salads for a refreshing twist.

Lakshmi Wholesale UK offers NATURES BLACK SALT 250GMS in bulk, making it a perfect option for home cooks, restaurants, and those looking to stock up on high-quality ingredients for their kitchen. THOKKU.name: PRIYA MANGO THOKKU PICKLE 300G
THOKKU.description_html:
PRIYA MANGO THOKKU PICKLE 300G

Priya Mango Thokku Pickle 300G is a traditional South Indian pickle made from ripe, tangy mangoes and a blend of aromatic spices. Thokku refers to a method of preparation that involves slow-cooking mango pulp with spices, creating a thick, flavorful paste that can complement a variety of dishes.

This Mango Thokku Pickle is a perfect combination of spicy, tangy, and savory flavors. It is made with high-quality ingredients, including fresh mangoes, mustard seeds, fenugreek, red chili powder, and turmeric, giving it an authentic taste that enhances the flavors of rice, chapati, paratha, or even as a side to grilled meats. Whether you prefer it with a simple meal or as a side dish to rich curries, Priya Mango Thokku Pickle brings a burst of flavor to any occasion.

Each jar contains 300g of this delicious, thick, and spicy pickle, providing a generous amount to enjoy over multiple meals. It is crafted to maintain its authentic taste and freshness, making it a must-have for pickle lovers. The unique blend of spices makes it a perfect accompaniment to your everyday meals.

Available at Lakshmi Wholesale UK, Priya Mango Thokku Pickle 300G is part of a vast selection of Indian wholesale groceries online. Shop Priya Mango Thokku Pickle 300G bulk online from www.lakshmiwholesale.com and experience the authentic taste of South India delivered right to your door.

Order your stock today and bring home the irresistible taste of Priya Mango Thokku Pickle, one of the finest Indian pickles available online in the UK.
